column2: With are failure in the Franco-Prussian War, in order to save their pride and prevent a German occupation the people took up the task of protecting Paris by themselves. Later the French Army would march to restore order to Paris but would be stopped but a group of women. Those gaurds of the French army would form a revolutionary gaurd that form a congress of near direct democracy and thus the Paris Commune was born.
With the reactionary France defeated we must restore and revive a new Commune of France.
